execerm.title: Execute Erm Commands [avoid changes to v1, z1, s, t, F1 and F2]
execerm.legend: Enter an ERM command (start without !! but end with ;).
execerm.legend2: Enter another ERM command (leave empty to skip).
execerm.error:
ERM command has a wrong syntax. Skipped.

@error@

trainer.wrongName: We coudn't locate this hero. Maybe the name is wrong?
trainer.noHero: You have no hero. Recruit one and then retry!
trainer.legendMain: Enter the hero's name or number (leave empty for heroes of current player).
trainer.forgAllSpl: Do you want @hero@ to forget all the spells?
trainer.resNeut: This hero belongs to neutral faction. Resources cannot be modified for neutral faction.
trainer.heroLvReset: Do you want @hero@ to be reset to level 1 and forget all the skills?
trainer.titleAddMon: How many @mon@ do you want to give to @hero@?
trainer.legendAddMon: Enter a number of creatures to give.
trainer.titleCustMon: Give a stack of creatures to @hero@.
trainer.legendCustMon: Enter a creature number (0..@max@) or a full creature name.
trainer.noMon: That doesn't sound like any creature we know! Try another one?
trainer.titleCustMonQty: How many @mon@ do you want to give to @hero@?
trainer.legendCustMonQty: Enter a number of creatures to give.
trainer.legendCustArt: Enter an artifact number (0..@max@) or a full artifact name.
trainer.noArt: That doesn't sound like any artifact we know! Try another one?
trainer.titleMov: How much movement do you want to give to @hero@?
trainer.legendMov: Enter a number of bonus tiles (0 to empty or negative to decrease).
trainer.titleMana: How much mana do you want to give to @hero@?
trainer.legendMana: Enter a number of bonus mana (0 to empty or negative to decrease).
trainer.revealNeut: This hero belongs to neutral faction. Revealing the map does not work for neutral faction.
trainer.reveal: Reveal the map for the @colour@ player?
trainer.rankOff: Stack experience is not enabled in this game.
trainer.rankNoArmy: There is no army in this slot.
trainer.legendMonQty: Enter a number of creatures (0 will remove the whole stack).
trainer.hintMonQty: Click to change the quantity of this stack.
trainer.cmdRmvArt: Remove this artifact from the commander? Warning: Incremental bonuses (if any) will be LOST!
trainer.cmdTitleArt:
Change times of vicotry @art@ has achieved.

Current victory: @victory@
trainer.paladin:
{~Chartreuse}@cmd@{~}

Class Specific Skills:

Gains 150% of Hero Experience.
May cast cure.
trainer.hierophant:
{~Chartreuse}@cmd@{~}

Class Specific Skills:

Additional first aid tents.
Number = Commander level.
May cast Shield.
trainer.templeGuardian:
{~Chartreuse}@cmd@{~}

Class Specific Skills:

Restores some spell points during battle.
Number = Commander level.
May cast Precision.
trainer.succubus:
{~Chartreuse}@cmd@{~}

Class Specific Skills:

Charm: steals neutral stacks before combat.
May cast Fire Shield.
trainer.soulEater:
{~Chartreuse}@cmd@{~}

Class Specific Skills:

Undead.
May cast Animate Dead.
trainer.brute:
{~Chartreuse}@cmd@{~}

Class Specific Skills:

Gives 50% of battle experience in gold.
May cast Bloodlust.
trainer.ogreLeader:
{~Chartreuse}@cmd@{~}

Class Specific Skills:

Provides additional Ballistas.
May cast Stone Skin.
trainer.shaman:
{~Chartreuse}@cmd@{~}

Class Specific Skills:

150% of Hero's Attack and Defense.
May cast Haste.
trainer.astralSpirit:
{~Chartreuse}@cmd@{~}

Class Specific Skills:

Enemy creatures run away before battle.
May cast Counterstrike.
trainer.titleCmdLv:
Change the level of the commander.

Warning: You won't get to the level up dialogue even if a greater level is set.
trainer.titleHenchExp:
Give battle experience to the henchman.

Current battle experience: @exp@
trainer.legendHenchExp: Enter a number of experience (0 to empty or negative to decrease).
trainer.objTitle:
Select an action to do.

Shotcuts: Alt-click to repeat the last action. Alt+num to change options.
trainer.objMainNoHero: The owner of @object@ has no hero! How unfortunate!
trainer.legendMovHero: Enter the hero's name or number (leave empty for heroes of current player).
trainer.objTelptNoHero: You have no hero to teleport with! Where did you hide them?
trainer.titleOwnerHero:
Choose a new owner for @object@.

Note: Only works if new owner has fewer than 8 active heroes
trainer.titleAdd:
Additional Cheats

Toggle features as you wish.
trainer.titleDate: Change the date of the game.
